DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Restasis ( topical cyclosporin ) effective treatment ocular rosacea
DOC.detailed_description: The study design compare efficacy topical cyclosporin ( Restasis ) Refresh Endura treatment sign symptom ocular rosacea patient presently control topical corticosteroid
DOC.criteria: Patient least 18 year old , young 65 Diagnosis acne rosacea Active ocular rosacea base lid finding meibomian gland dysfunction lid telangiectasia hyperemia least 2+ Schirmers test great 5mm least 1 eye If patient currently use lid hygiene must maintain regimen study Stop oral antibiotic least 4 week prior Use topical cyclosporin within last 90 day Visual acuity 20/100 good eye Pregnant lactate female Active ocular infection Scarring central cornea Eyelid defect , abnormal lid positioning lagophthalmos Flax seed Fish oil supplement within last 30 day
